page.description: The Parent List properties help in binding one list a the child of a second list. This can be particularly useful in creating cascading lists where the selection in one list will determine the available options for a second list.

section.description: For a video demonstration on how to create cascading lists using the 'Parent List' property watch these videos ([video 1], [video 2]) or read their accompaning transcripts ([transcript 1], [transcript 2]).
